scripts.dev:api: pnpm --filter @repo/db run build && dotenv -e .env -- pnpm --filter api run dev
scripts.db:migrate: dotenv -e packages/db/.env -- pnpm --filter @repo/db exec prisma migrate dev
scripts.db:push: dotenv -e packages/db/.env -- pnpm --filter @repo/db exec prisma db push
scripts.db:studio: dotenv -e packages/db/.env -- pnpm --filter @repo/db exec prisma studio
